snippet: Unit of Hinduja Group to acquire a Houston based oil and lubricant company.
abstract: Unit of Hinduja Group to acquire a Houston based oil and lubricant company.
lead_paragraph: The Gulf Oil Corporation, part of the Indian conglomerate Hinduja Group, “agreed on Wednesday to buy the chemical and lubricant company Houghton International from the private equity firm AEA Investors for $1 billion,” Mark Scott wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: Gulf Oil of India to Buy Houghton International for $1 Billion
